name: contracts
description: - Each "answer" is a "round" - Owner is the only person that can start a new round - The round needs to have a minimum duration - There needs to be a "winner" to start the next round - The contract needs to be an NFT contract     - ERC-1155 (token id 0 for winners,token id 1 for runners up)     - Mint Id 0 if the user is the first person to guess correctly in the round     - Mint Id 1 if they got it correct but they are not the first in that round - To check if the user's guess is correct we will call the Verifier smart contract
